info.task: navigate to cell containing link on previous row in grid
info.title: Navigate to a cell containing a link on the previous row in a grid in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnSecondLinkedCell
setupScript.description: sets focus on the third cell of the third row in the grid

user: From a cell containing a link, navigate to the previous row in the grid.
instructions.raw: From a cell containing a link, navigate to the previous row in the grid.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Text of the column header ('Description') is conveyed
coordinates of the cell (column 3, row 2) are conveyed
